alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 23 at 7:50PM PST until November 25 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM THURSDAY TO NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with local gusts to 45 mph, except 30 to 45 mph, with gusts 60 to 75 mph on more the wind- prone coastal slopes. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 AM Thursday to noon Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest and most widespread winds are expected during the day on Thanksgiving. The combination of strong winds, low humidity and warm weather will result in several hours of critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
